ComicInfo.Summary: The Word on the Street: Bruce takes down Caitlin's abusive ex, Joe Dorgan, after which Bruce and Stefan play out their fight scene for the movie. Bruce has to let Stefan look good, and Stefan ends up hurting Bruce on purpose. However, Bruce gets his own back on Stefan at an after party. The Treys street gang again attack Bruce's dojo and Stefan helps Bruce deal with them, but ends up hurt and in the hospital. Bruce is offered the leading role in another movie.
